jobDescription: We are currently seeking a highly motivated individual to be part of a team managing all aspects of our clients insurance programs.  Duties include:  Contacts decision making individuals of prospective personal insurance clients or prospective clients directly to secure their interest in our services. Reviews our services with prospect to anticipate present and future needs. Develops and/or coordinates the actual presentation to the prospect, acting in a prudent business manner to ensure maximum efficiency and profitability of the account. Provides for the smooth transition of new business to support staff to maintain appropriate level of service. Remain actively involved with clients to: (a) develop additional business, (b) assist with renewals when necessary, and (c) act as troubleshooter to maintain accounts.
